description:
Add Background Sync for offline mutations and offline status indicator.

Currently: `vite-plugin-pwa: 1.2.0` in catalog configures Workbox. `idb-keyval: 6.2.2` in catalog for IndexedDB. No offline mutation queue exists. No offline indicator component.

Deliverables:
1. Update `apps/parametric_icons/vite.config.ts`: configure Workbox `backgroundSync` plugin with `queueName: 'offline-mutations'`
2. Create custom service worker handler for POST/PUT/DELETE requests that queues to IndexedDB on network failure
3. Use `idb-keyval` for simple key-value storage of pending mutations
4. Create `packages/components-next/src/feedback/offline-indicator.tsx` component
5. Component listens to `navigator.onLine` and `online`/`offline` events
6. Use `data-slot="offline-indicator"`, `data-offline="true|false"` for styling
7. Export from `packages/components-next`

Acceptance: `pnpm exec nx run parametric_icons:build` succeeds. Offline indicator shows when `navigator.onLine === false`. Queued mutation replays automatically when online.
title: PWA offline support
